summary: This mod Replaces the Body model for Females with better and more realistic ones .
descriptionHtml:
[center][FONT=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=red]      A new Better Improved Female Body replacement[/size]



[i][b]
similar polygon count
similar textures
Same UV maps
Full compatibility with any Vanilla outfit
Full compatibility with any texture replacement 
Full compatibility with all mods vanilla compatibile        [/color][/b][/i][/FONT]
 
 
For nude body, you need the main file, then overwrite with the meshes from the nude files. 
[/center] 




This mod Replaces the Body model for Females with better and more realistic ones .


The comparison in Polycount is as follows :

Vanilla Version   3408 polygons Body + Underwear 

Covered Version 3384 polygons Body + 2522 Underwear 

Nude Low           3384 polygons 

Nude Smooth      3776 polygons 

This is the \"Covered\" version , a Nude version Will be available later this evening with slight changed Breasts due to beeing unsupported by a bra ....

It leaves unaltered the Uvmaps of original game so that it doesn\'t break any texture ...

introduces a perfectly seamless nude body texture 

improved textures and custom made mesh redone over the seam seams of the Vanilla meshes 

keeping almoust the same polygon count and so having the same performances

the actual textures are doubled in dimensions varying from 2048 to 1024 versus the original 1024 to 512 ...

my version of an improved new better body for females , the model is a new model that shapes around the original vanilla adding a more revealing suit , more curves in the right places and a overall improved realism of the figure without exagerating the proportions of the feminine parts ... the mesh is low polygonal as the Vanilla one , with a slight logic small increment compared to the old version ... the textures are replaced with higher version ones , they respect the same uvmaps so can eventually be replaced with other texture mods and do not break any other armor or retexture mod ...



Please let me know what you think of this mod


This mod was created because I needed a better female figure for my Female Conan outfits and this become so a spin off from my original work on Conan outfits ....

since people liked I decided to release as well as standalone version , the nude version will feature a slight different body shape with bra unlifted breasts.
author: Prometheus
